programme.desc: Adventures that explore the unknown and take viewers to an amazing wildlife encounter.

programme.desc: About a stereotypical grandmother who is kind, loving and attentive. Unknown to many, she is benevolent keeper of an extraordinary and mystical family secret.

programme.title: Akusada
programme.desc: Is the story of Carolina Astor, a resort staff who accidentally “kills” Joi, a resort shareholder. Carolina goes into hiding and assumes a new identity - Lorena. Lorena moves on and starts a new life but her past will haunt her.

programme.title: It's Showtime
programme.desc: 'It's Showtime' is a hit variety program that thrives on spontaneity and animated conversations.

programme.title: Hindi Pa Tapos Ang Laban
programme.desc: In a world where the most corrupt are the most powerful, is there a room a good man’s quest for justice to succeed? The undisputed King of Action takes on the role of a modern day crusader in this exciting, action packed movie that pits the powers of goodness against the forces of evil.

programme.title: Pintsik Haik
programme.desc: As a head of a small time general services, business and some illegal activity, Mando is satisfied enough on what they earned and share some blessings to the charity. But one day he was hired to rescue the father of May-leng.

programme.title: Tondo, Libingan Ng Mga Siga
programme.desc: Utoy (Paolo Contis) idolizes his friend and benefactor Johnny (Vic Sotto), whom he looks up to as an older brother. Johnny finds employment as a driver and bodyguard for pretty commercial model Jessica (Christine Jacob).

programme.title: Dyesebel (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: The retelling of the classic tale by the great Mars Ravelo. After years of hiding from a cruel, suspicious society on the land, mermaid Dyesebel (Charlene Gonzales) returns and falls in love with a man named Fredo (Matthew Mendoza).

programme.title: Alyas Waway
programme.desc: Waway was the notorious mad killer who ran circles around the people of Metro Manila during the 70's. Based on real-life events and features Cesar Montanos as Waway in one of his best performances.

programme.title: Tayong Dalawa
programme.desc: Sharon Cuneta teamed up with Gabby Concepcion in what is considered their best work together. Her coming to terms with her new, free lifestyle and how she cope with his former girlfriend, who refused to let him go is the gist of the movie.

programme.title: Andrea, Paano Ba Ang Maging Isang Ina?
programme.desc: Two teachers find themselves on opposite sides in the fight for freedom. Nora Aunor is the woman who chose to join the rebels while her friend, Gina Alajar opted for a quiet life with her husband.

programme.title: Sa Bawat Tunog Ng Kampana
programme.desc: Rodel (Philip Salvador) suspects his father did not die during a mine collapse as his employer Don Gonzalo (Vic Diaz) claims. If we consider that Rodel's father is a cook, the son's suspicions are justified.

programme.title: Sunugin Si Antero Castro
programme.desc: For the longest time, it has been Antero Castro's dream to be a soldier.Can Antero uncover this conspiracy and arrest the real criminals?

programme.title: Bakit Kay Tagal Ng Sandali?
programme.desc: Nina (Dina Bonnevie) and Ted (Julio Diaz) are sweethearts. Ted convinces her to accept Don Edmundo's (Eddie Garcia) suit as the old man is said to be dying anyway.

programme.title: Hulihin Si Boy Amores
programme.desc: A former policeman defies the law and meets a violent death.

programme.title: Where 'D' Girls 'R'
programme.desc: Rapper-comedian Andrew E and the kids from the hit TV series TGIS combined together in this merry mix-up about poor boys falling in love with rich girls, who were guarded by a very strict maiden aunt.

programme.title: Kanto Boy 2 (Anak Ni Totoy Gwapo)
programme.desc: Guiller, the son of the notorious Totoy Guwapo grew up as an orphan. He ended up in prison after accidentally killing a man in a street fight and it was there that he came to terms with life and discovered his own identity.

programme.title: Takot Ako Sa Darling Ko
programme.desc: It was love at first sight between Joey de Leon and Jenny Syquia but there was a big problem. She belonged to a family of vampires who had reformed and were now on their way to becoming normal human beings.

programme.title: Manalo Matalo, Mahal Kita
programme.desc: Mikee played the girl selling lotto tickets. Cesar spent his last ten pesos on a ticket hoping to win the jackpot. The two had some fights, which eventually fade off as both fell in love with each other.

programme.title: Paano Ba Ang Mangarap? (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Lisa (Vilma Santos) and Benny (Jay Ilagan) have found their match in each other. Unfortunately, Benny dies before they get married.

programme.title: Kuwatog
programme.desc: Child sensation Niño Muhlach plays the lovable dwarf \"Kuwatog.\" As punishment for his many pranks, he is transformed into a human child, here to remain until he does a deed that will benefit mankind.

programme.title: Isang Tanong, Isang Sagot
programme.desc: Jason played the role of a rich and bratty student who fell in love with one of his maids, played by the lovely Donna Cruz. Surprised at the turn of events, he tried to hide his feelings by being unkind to the girl.

programme.title: Dunkin Donato
programme.desc: Donato and Buknoy has to win the championship of the interbarangay league. The money will be used to fund the many beneficial projects for the community. Will their talent be enough to win the game without having to resort to Magical Power?

programme.title: Hindi Mo Ako Kayang Tapakan
programme.desc: This is the story of Tacing--a woman involved in different love affairs, which resulted in endless trials and tribulations. Nardo, Tom, Ramon and Angelito, were just some of the many men who became part of Tacing's life and played parts in making her accept the reality of womanhood.

programme.title: Kailan Tama Ang Mali? (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: This is a film about women in the underbelly of the city of Manila where making a living is always difficult for the poor and material things do not guarantee happiness.

programme.title: Kahit Ako'y Busabos
programme.desc: Guiller (Ace Vergel), a young man who grew up in the slums of Tondo as a street toughie. In truth though, he was a kind-hearted man, who was forced to hide the good in him in order to survive in the cruel environment he grew up in.

programme.title: Anak Ni Baby Ama (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Baby Ama was a notorious hoodlum sent to the electric chair during the 60's. This movie is a fictionalized account of what life might have been for his son who came to this world already burdened with the memory of his father's life and death.
